Package javax.jcr.lock

Provides interfaces and classes for content repository locking functionality.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Lock Represents a lock placed on an item.
LockManager This interface encapsulates methods for the management of locks.
 

Exception Summary
LockException Exception thrown by when a lock-related error occurs.
 

Package javax.jcr.lock Description

Provides interfaces and classes for content repository locking functionality.
